original_title: The Final Events of Bible Prophecy
overview: The Final Events of Bible Prophecy unlocks the amazing Bible truth of Earth’s last days. Discover what the Bible really says about the rapture, the millennium, the second coming and more! Stunning visuals and special effects lead viewers through the last days to when the earth will be restored to its Edenic wonder!
tagline: Unlock the amazing Bible truth of Earth's last days!
title: The Final Events of Bible Prophecy
